alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Foothills; Kern River Valley; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 1:57PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Tulare County through 230 PM PST... At 156 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 10 miles east of East Porterville, or 13 miles east of Porterville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quaking Aspen, Oak Opening, Camp Nelson, Ponderosa, Peppermint, Springville and Johnsondale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
